00030 #include "OgreGpuProgram.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033 
00035     class GLGpuProgram : public GpuProgram
00036     {
00037     public:
00038         GLGpuProgram(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00039             const String& group, bool isManual = false, ManualResourceLoader* loader = 0);
00040         virtual ~GLGpuProgram();
00041 
00043         virtual void bindProgram(void) {}
00045         virtual void unbindProgram(void) {}
00047         void loadFromSource(void) {}
00048 
00050         virtual void bindProgramParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params) {}
00052         virtual void bindProgramPassIterationParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params) {}
00053 
00054 
00056         const GLuint getProgramID(void) const
00057         { return mProgramID; }
00058 
00059     protected:
00061         void unloadImpl(void) {}
00062 
00063         GLuint mProgramID;
00064         GLenum mProgramType;
00065     };
00066 
00068     class GLArbGpuProgram : public GLGpuProgram
00069     {
00070     public:
00071         GLArbGpuProgram(ResourceManager* creator, const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00072             const String& group, bool isManual = false, ManualResourceLoader* loader = 0);
00073         virtual ~GLArbGpuProgram();
00074 
00076         void setType(GpuProgramType t);
00077 
00078 
00080         void bindProgram(void);
00082         void unbindProgram(void);
00084         void bindProgramParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00086         void bindProgramPassIterationParameters(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00087 
00089         const GLuint getProgramType(void) const
00090         { return mProgramType; }
00091 
00092     protected:
00093         void loadFromSource(void);
00095         void unloadImpl(void);
00096 
00097     };
